themes: support for niche and underrepresented communities
impact of federal and state funding cuts
lack of private philanthropy for small organizations
key_phrases: improve the ability for artists to live and do their creative work in Austin
Artist Resource Grants that North Adams, MA did
expanded support for cultural activities that serve niche communities
support for critical, mid-level, artist-run institutions in Austin that are at risk
federal funding cancellation and state funding precarity
private philanthropy is not here like it is in Houston or Dallas
resources for Austin-based artists to show their work elsewhere
barriers_identified: affordability for artists to live and work in Austin
risk to mid-level, artist-run institutions due to funding cuts
lack of private philanthropy for smaller-budget organizations
solutions_proposed: implement Artist Resource Grants similar to North Adams, MA
expand support for niche communities and their venues
increase support for mid-level, artist-run institutions
city to step up support during funding crisis
provide resources for Austin-based artists to present work outside the city
